rows: Tile caption that will be displayed in the filter menu. It must have plural form, for example, "Tasks." Localization is performed via theSysTimelineTileSettingLcztable. If this field is not populated, the tile caption will be derived from the entity or type schema name.
Section timeline setup in JSON format.
The tile icon that will be displayed in the filter menu and on the left side of the tile on theTimelinetab.
html:
Column

Details

Id

Record identifier.

Name

Tile caption that will be displayed in the filter menu. It must have plural form, for example, "Tasks." Localization is performed via the SysTimelineTileSettingLcz table. If this field is not populated, the tile caption will be derived from the entity or type schema name.

Data

Section timeline setup in JSON format.

Image

The tile icon that will be displayed in the filter menu and on the left side of the tile on the Timeline tab.
